description:
She is the only caretaker of the complete manuscript of the limitless knowledge of the Claire Bible found in the Temple of Sand, where she first met Lina Inverse and the Slayers.
In the anime, when Garv called Auntie Aqua "Water Dragon King" - she says - that is the only remnant of the Water Dragon King, which killed 1,000 years ago. Auntie Aqua is an illusion created by the manuscripts. It occurs only in the anime.
name: Aqua Baa-chan
